right.text: this is where they reassure all the fatties that they're still beautiful, etc

left.text: okay, so today is the MSU womens center's LOVE YOUR BODY fair, right.

panels.narration: anyway I had to pass through the fair to get breakfast today and I pass some fat girl and her overly feminist friend

left.text: the fat girl looks at me and starts fucking CRYING
the feminist gives me this evil look and says PEOPLE LIKE YOU ARE PART OF THE PROBLEM
